page.title: 07Abercynon's Youth Activities
page.content: The youth of our Domesday Block enjoy a typical range of{recreation} facilities. The main attraction of the area is the{leisure centre}which has a {swimming pool,}football, squash, netball and badminton courts. The centre was opened in 1974 and is part of Abercynon Park which also has tennis courts and outdoor pitches for soccer, rugby and cricket as well as a bowling green for theolder people. There are a number of {clubs} in the area where young people can take part in a wide range of activities. There are Guides, Brownies, Scouts and Cubs as well as Youth Clubs. When we interviewed the assistant manager of the Leisure Centre he told us of plans to open up a roller skating rink and that competitions with other centres in the area were stopped because they had become too expensive to run.
